documents.document: Ikea is literally a maze with cheese at the end.
@github service is great, they solved a problem I had with building the pages for #ivgii in no time flat
Hey, I'm an exceptional JavaScripter http://osrc.dfm.io/JJ  I don't know if I should be sad for not being an exceptional Perler...

today I are mostly correcting the English and typos in a draft PhD thesis (even though the external examiner @jjmerelo is Spanish)

I'm curious about the insult "tryhard". Is it actually criticizing people who make an effort, or is it more ironic than that?
My Twitter app crashed. I thought I would die.
@issuu right now returning repeatedly "0: Undefined error"

“Teens aren’t abandoning “social.” They’re just using the word correctly. ” by @cwthethird https://medium.com/understandings-epiphanies/aae8d5f880cc … #socialmediagrx
Fast food granaína (@ Bocateria Aliatar) http://4sq.com/JdLnEF
Me dice un amigo que no. Que él no usa ninguna red social. -"¿Y cómo hará para perder el tiempo este tipo"?- me pregunto, intrigado.
Necesito parar!! Stop.
Reading "The Ask", waiting for it to get better...

Read the classics... and then rewrite them, my take on literature, ramen profitability and stuff in @medium https://medium.com/p/35cfe524884e
It's impossible to please everyone. Write the way YOU write, at all times, and you'll find your readers.

How about "How do we prevent 10 y/o girls who like computers from abandoning them?"
